name: Pablo's "Pearls Before Swine" Quiz | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.text: What did Pig put over his whole body because he was afraid of bad things?
questions.explanation:
a giant oven mitt.

	At first Pig just put on two normal oven mitts until Rat told him that oven mitts would only protect his hands, but Pig is so stupid that he decided to put on a giant oven mitt to protect his whole body.

questions.text: Pig bought a guard duck for his yard.
questions.explanation:
True.

	There were no dogs left at the store, so he got a duck instead. People thought the duck was weak, but when they laughed at it, the duck showed its vicious side.

questions.text: What did the employees do at the giant department store that upset Wee Bear?
questions.correct: They were forced to cheer for their employer.
options: They were beating up one of the customers.
They were throwing merchandise at people.
questions.explanation:
They were forced to cheer for their employer.

	This upset Wee Bear because he thought that it was wrong to have to cheer your employer when you have a job with lousy benefits.

questions.text: Pig put himself into the recycling bin.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Goat told Pig that recycling meant putting something that nobody wants into a recycling bin. He told Pig that recyclers turn the stuff into things that people want. So now you can guess why Pig put himself in there.

questions.text: What is the name of the written works that Rat creates?
questions.explanation:
The Adventures of Angry Bob.

	In "The Adventures of Angry Bob," Bob always dies at the end.

questions.text: Neighbor Bob's half-brother Phil has no torso.
questions.explanation:
True.

	When Rat first met Phil, Rat instantly knew that taking Phil's wallet was to his (Rat's) advantage, but Neighbor Bob was one step ahead of Rat--Bob took Phil's money before Rat could get it.

questions.text: The crocodiles that always try to trap Zebra live many miles away from him.
questions.explanation:
False.

	In their words, Zebra is their "neigh-bah." They live right next door.

questions.text: When the crocodiles decided to be "vegetarians," what kind of costumes did they wear?
questions.explanation:
They dressed as carrots.

	They didn't know that "vegetarian" does NOT mean "vegetable."

questions.text: When Rat scammed people into paying $60 to have grains of sand named after them, what was the title on his binder?
options: There was no title on the binder.
questions.explanation:
Morons I've Fleeced.

	When one guy saw the title, he said, "It says 'Morons I've Fleeced.'" Rat's reply was, "Ignore the title."

questions.text: Cupid got tired of his job and hired Pig to do it for him.
questions.explanation:
True.

	In the comic, it showed a picture of a knocked-out guy with an arrow in him. "Too hard," said Cupid to Pig.
